title: John Finucane – 2022 Comments Calling for DUP to End Boycott of Executive
author: admin
summary: The comments made by John Finucane, the Sinn Fein MP for North Belfast, on 4 October 2022.
content:
DUP representatives are tripping over themselves to double down on their shameful boycott of the Executive and dereliction of duty during a cost-of-living emergency.
